summary: This code sets up environment variables, creates an output directory if it doesn't exist, and runs a Python script to process input files in the specified directory. The processed data is saved in the output directory.

details.comment: This code sets up environment variables, creates an output directory if it doesn't exist, and runs a Python script to process input files in the specified directory. The processed data is saved in the output directory.
details.content:
set -e
INPUT_DIR="./rlhf/cot_sample"
OUTPUT_DIR="./rlhf/processed"
mkdir -p $OUTPUT_DIR
python3 process.py --input_dir=$INPUT_DIR --output_dir=$OUTPUT_DIR
